description:
It is clear that Virtual Project Management is here to stay. The Worldwide demand for skilled and knowledgeable virtual project managers is exploding. The course offers compressed end to end contemporary practical approach to this exciting body of knowledge.

Course Summary:

1.Holistic view, implications.

2.Definition of Virtual Project Management.

3.What is a (virtual) team and (virtual) environment?

4.VPM and knowledge work.

5.Positive and negative aspects of VPM.
title: What is Virtual Project Management
